backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: CV download button in HeroSection and its responsive design across screen sizes, both with high confidence and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing the portfolio application structure, including hero section, certifications gallery with modal, and various content sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that renders the complete portfolio layout including hero section, professional sections, certifications gallery, and footer in sequence.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Full-screen modal component for viewing certificates with navigation controls (previous/next buttons), keyboard support (Escape, arrow keys), and accessibility features.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Gallery component displaying 54 professional certification images in a responsive grid with click-to-expand modal functionality and state management for selected certificate.
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: Section component displaying nine technical competencies in a responsive grid with icons, including project management, CAD design, cybersecurity, and data analytics skills.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Education section listing three academic qualifications (B.Eng, OND, and secondary certificates) with institution names and graduation years in card format.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters derived from hostname.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the hero banner with profile image, name, credentials (MNSE, COREN), contact information (email, phone, location), and a CV download button with gradient background and animations.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: Renders a grid of personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) with corresponding icons in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: Displays professional certifications organized into six categories (Engineering Memberships, Project & Risk Management, Data & AI, Cybersecurity, Process Improvement, Technical Courses) with icons and detailed lists.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Shows a timeline of work experience entries with company names, job titles, periods, and responsibilities, featuring a visual timeline on larger screens.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Presents a brief professional summary paragraph highlighting expertise in Materials & Metallurgical Engineering, Project Management, Cybersecurity, and Data Analytics.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists five research papers with titles and DOI links that open externally, styled as interactive cards with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages ICP backend actor creation based on Internet Identity authentication state, using React Query for caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing identity state and login status throughout the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the portfolio uses static content without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, base typography styles for headings and paragraphs, and utility classes including a grid pattern background.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, mounting to the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color system, container settings, border radius variables, custom shadows, and keyframe animations for accordions and other UI elements.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Ebruvwiyor Osiobe with sections for hero, summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience, publications, and interests, including architectural notes and existing feature definitions.
